title: How to start the preparation for the UPSC? How do I make a schedule and which books should I prefer - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: First, (starters) Start with the basics - NCERT’s - you can read ncert solely through smartphone, an app called “eBooks 4 IAS” on play store, all neccessary chapters from 6th to 12th is included.  Second, ( Beverages) - for current affairs you can watch Study Iq daily current affairs videos ( by Mahipal sir, Prashant sir, Ankit sir, Anirudh sir ) - also in the Study Iq youtube channel you will find foundation course wich is free of cost you can watch it and make consolidated notes from it. Third, ( Main course) Standard books - you can refer from toppers. Fourth, ( Dessert) Magazines(summaries only) and other youtube channels - yojana, kurukshetra, RS tv, LS tv, PIB, Economic survey and Budget.
